content: **size ** one size **needles ** circular needles 4 mm 80 cm for body and 3 5 mm 40 cm or 60 cm for cords **suggested yarn ** 25 g of sunday sandnes garn 235 m / 50 g or fabel by drops 205 m / 50 g or tynn peer gynt sandnes garn 205 m / 50 g held together with 10 g of tynn silk mohair sandnes garn 212 m / 25 g or kid-silk by drops 210 m / 25 g **sample knitted with yarns ** beige sunday sandnes garn in 2650 and tynn silk mohair in colour 2511 red fabel by drops in colour 106 and tynn silk mohair in colour 4008 blue tynn peer gynt sandnes garn in 6046 and tynn silk mohair in colour 6046
